effect_entries.effect: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Feigns crying to sharply
lower the foe’s SP. DEF.

Feigns crying to sharply
lower the foe’s SP. DEF.

The user feigns
crying to sharply
lower the foe’s
SP. DEF stat.

The user feigns
crying to make the
foe feel flustered,
sharply lowering its
Sp. Def stat.

The user feigns
crying to make the
foe feel flustered,
sharply lowering its
Sp. Def stat.

The user feigns
crying to make the
foe feel flustered,
sharply lowering its
Sp. Def stat.

Le lanceur fait semblant de pleurer
pour troubler l’ennemi et baisser
fortement sa Défense Spéciale.

The user feigns crying to fluster
the target, harshly lowering its
Sp. Def stat.

The user feigns crying to fluster
the target, harshly lowering its
Sp. Def stat.

ないた　ふりをして　なみだを　ながす。
こまらせる　ことで
あいての　とくぼうを　がくっと　さげる。

우는 척을 하며 눈물을 흘린다.
난처하게 만들어
상대의 특수방어를 크게 떨어뜨린다.

Le lanceur fait semblant de pleurer pour troubler
l’ennemi et baisser fortement sa Défense Spéciale.

Täuscht Weinen vor, um die Spezial-Verteidigung
des Zieles stark zu senken.

Lágrimas de cocodrilo que bajan mucho la
Defensa Especial del objetivo.

Chi la usa inscena un pianto teatrale per
commuovere il bersaglio. Ne riduce di molto la
Difesa Speciale.

The user feigns crying to fluster
the target, harshly lowering its
Sp. Def stat.

ないた　ふりをして　涙を　流す。
こまらせる　ことで
相手の　特防を　がくっと　さげる。
